Class MarlinCoordinate

java.lang.Object
com.marginallyclever.ro3.node.nodes.marlinrobot.marlinrobotarm.marlinsimulation.MarlinCoordinate
public class MarlinCoordinate extends Object
MarlinCoordinate is a vector used to represent the simultaneous motion of motors in a MarlinSimulationBlock.
